column4: i got a problem when i complie the mplayer, who can help me ?
but what exactly is the problem? (i sincerely reccomend you DON"T compile mplayer yourself)
why? is there anything wrong with the precompiled one?
yes, compiled it.and worked fine,but there are no "xv" option in the output selection :(
what's wrong with the precompiled version that comes with ubuntu though?
i can player tha avi files well,but i can only basic on "x11" output ~
i mean that i want to let mplayer can be support the "xv" output,but it can't :(
i don't understand what compelled you to compile mplayer though
complied mplayer through the sources,not by the apt-get way
is the have the "xv" selection support in your mplayer ? i don't have it
oh so the version that came with ubuntu didn't have the xv?
yes i have the xv output in my mplayer, and i didn't compile anything myself
i see . you got it throught the apt-get install way?
in my memory,i apt-get install it at first. and it maybe have the 'xv' optition in it.but after that i reinstall it through the sources. but it have no xv selection after i compiled it :(
